Description:
<0>GetDopplerFactor - retrieves the multiplier for the Doppler effect.
<1>HRESULT IDirectSound3DListener::GetDopplerFactor(
<3/><1>D3DVALUE* <2>DopplerFactor
<1>);
<2>DopplerFactor - pointer to a variable that receives the Doppler factor value.

<0>SetDopplerFactor - sets the multiplier for the Doppler effect.
<1>HRESULT IDirectSound3DListener::SetDopplerFactor(
<3/><1>D3DVALUE <2>DopplerFactor<1>,
<3/><1>DWORD dwApply
<1>);
<2>DopplerFactor - new value of the Doppler factor, which should be in the range of <2>DS3D_MINDOPPLERFACTOR(0) and <2>DS3D_MAXDOPPLERFACTOR(10). The default value is DS3D_DEFAULTDOPPLERFACTOR (1.0)..
Name: Doppler factor
